attributes.action: I would like form a petition asking for a box on our voting forms for the next general election to have a none of the above. I feel this is the only way we the voters can show how disillusioned we have become with politician's. And make it law that anyone aged 18 must vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
